name: Date - MMDDYY (leap year included)
description: Sorry for the looooong RegEx but I didn't find a perfect one for my use. Here goes: STEP 1:(a) Checks for (MMDD) for 31days months(b) Checks for (MMDD) for 30 days(c) Checks for (MMDD) for 28 days (no leap yr check)(d) Checks for (MMDD) = 0229 with only the possible leap years (2000-2096)::STEP 2: (YY) \d{2} = any 2 digit number can be year.Mail me at aviralmsharma@gmail.com if you find error(s)
author: Aviral Sharma
